subtitle:
1
00:00:17,000 --> 00:00:22,000
góa bat chòe-kòe gōng cha-bó͘-gín-á
I used to be a foolish girl

2
00:00:23,000 --> 00:00:24,500
chhēng i ê chhián-thoa
Wearing his slippers

3
00:00:24,500 --> 00:00:28,500
chhin-chhiūⁿ i ê hit chi̍t-pòaⁿ
Like I was his other half

4
00:00:29,500 --> 00:00:32,000
nn̄g-ê lâng hiah-nī hó
Two people so close

5
00:00:32,000 --> 00:00:33,500
kiâⁿ kàu bóe
Walking to the end

6
00:00:33,500 --> 00:00:35,000
bô óa-khò
With no one to rely on

7
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:39,000
ài chhin-chhiūⁿ sap-bûn-pho
Love is like soap bubbles

8
00:00:39,000 --> 00:00:43,000
chêng-hūn ná chiah-nī po̍h
Why is the connection so fragile?

9
00:00:47,000 --> 00:00:49,000
thâu-mn̂g chiah iù
Hair so fine and soft

10
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:53,000
miā ná bô chiah hó
Why is my fate not as good?

11
00:00:53,000 --> 00:00:55,000
pa̍t-lâng leh chhit-thô
Others are out having fun

12
00:00:55,000 --> 00:00:59,000
góa ūi seng-oa̍h piàⁿ tām-po̍h
I struggle a bit for a living

13
00:01:00,000 --> 00:01:03,000
chi̍t-ê-lâng ak-hō͘
One person in the rain

14
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:06,000
iā m̄ kam-goān hoah khó͘
Unwilling to cry out in pain

15
00:01:06,000 --> 00:01:09,000
in-ūi góa ê chhiò-bīn
Because my smiling face

16
00:01:09,000 --> 00:01:13,000
sī góa ê ku̍t-kiông
Is my stubbornness

17
00:01:14,500 --> 00:01:18,000
chiong gún ê tn̂g thâu-chang
Taking my long hair

18
00:01:18,000 --> 00:01:21,000
chián chòe té thâu-chang
Cutting it short

19
00:01:21,000 --> 00:01:24,000
cha-bó͘-lâng ê sim
A woman's heart

20
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:29,000
siong-hûn bōe-kham-leh khàng
Has scars that are hard to bear

21
00:01:29,500 --> 00:01:33,000
siàu-liân-sî kóng kah chiah hó
Spoken so well in our youth

22
00:01:33,000 --> 00:01:36,000
bí-lē ê bāng
Beautiful dreams

23
00:01:36,000 --> 00:01:38,500
gōng-lâng chiah ē siong-sìn
Only fools would believe

24
00:01:38,500 --> 00:01:41,500
bô-hāu ê chiù-chōa
Those invalid vows

25
00:01:41,500 --> 00:01:45,000
chiong gún ê té thâu-chang
Taking my short hair

26
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:48,000
ní tńg o͘ thâu-chang
Dyeing it back to black

27
00:01:48,000 --> 00:01:51,000
bōe cha̍p-peh ê sim
A heart not yet eighteen

28
00:01:51,000 --> 00:01:55,000
tùi ài iáu-ū hi-bāng
Still has hope for love

29
00:01:55,500 --> 00:01:59,000
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē tú-tio̍h
One day I will meet

30
00:01:59,000 --> 00:02:04,000
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê hit ê lâng
The person destined by fate

31
00:02:04,000 --> 00:02:08,000
góa ē-tàng ūi i chhēng
I can wear for him

32
00:02:08,000 --> 00:02:12,000
hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
That wedding dress

33
00:02:23,500 --> 00:02:25,500
thâu-mn̂g chiah iù
Hair so fine and soft

34
00:02:25,500 --> 00:02:29,000
miā ná bô chiah hó
Why is my fate not as good?

35
00:02:30,000 --> 00:02:31,500
pa̍t-lâng leh chhit-thô
Others are out having fun

36
00:02:31,500 --> 00:02:35,500
góa ūi seng-oa̍h piàⁿ tām-po̍h
I struggle a bit for a living

37
00:02:36,500 --> 00:02:39,000
chi̍t-ê-lâng ak-hō͘
One person in the rain

38
00:02:39,000 --> 00:02:42,500
iā m̄ kam-goān hoah gōa khó͘
Unwilling to cry out how bitter it is

39
00:02:43,000 --> 00:02:45,500
in-ūi góa ê chhiò-bīn
Because my smiling face

40
00:02:45,500 --> 00:02:48,500
sī góa ê ku̍t-kiông
Is my stubbornness

41
00:02:49,000 --> 00:02:52,000
chiong gún ê té thâu-chang
Taking my short hair

42
00:02:52,000 --> 00:02:55,000
ní tńg o͘ thâu-chang
Dyeing it back to black

43
00:02:55,000 --> 00:02:58,000
bōe cha̍p-peh ê sim
A heart not yet eighteen

44
00:02:58,000 --> 00:03:02,000
tùi ài iáu-ū hi-bāng
Still has hope for love

45
00:03:02,500 --> 00:03:06,000
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē tú-tio̍h
One day I will meet

46
00:03:06,000 --> 00:03:10,500
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê hit ê lâng
The person destined by fate

47
00:03:11,000 --> 00:03:14,000
góa ē-tàng ūi i
I will be able to, for him

48
00:03:14,000 --> 00:03:18,000
chhēng hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
Wear that wedding dress

49
00:03:38,000 --> 00:03:41,000
gún ê tn̂g thâu-chang
Taking my long hair

50
00:03:41,000 --> 00:03:44,000
chián chòe té thâu-chang
Cutting it short

51
00:03:44,000 --> 00:03:47,000
cha-bó͘-lâng ê sim
A woman's heart

52
00:03:47,000 --> 00:03:51,500
siong-hûn bōe-kham-leh khàng
Has scars that are hard to bear

53
00:03:53,000 --> 00:03:56,500
siàu-liân-sî kóng kah chiah hó
Spoken so well in our youth

54
00:03:56,500 --> 00:03:59,500
bí-lē ê bāng
Beautiful dreams

55
00:03:59,500 --> 00:04:02,000
siōng-hó ê miā
The very best life

56
00:04:02,000 --> 00:04:05,500
lóng-sī pa̍t-lâng ê hó-miā
Is always someone else's good life

57
00:04:05,500 --> 00:04:08,500
tī Tâi-pak kúi-lō tang
In Taipei for several years

58
00:04:08,500 --> 00:04:12,000
gún iā piàn tōa-lâng
I have become an adult too

59
00:04:12,000 --> 00:04:15,000
kòe saⁿ-cha̍p ê góa
Me, past thirty

60
00:04:15,000 --> 00:04:19,000
kám ē ū-lâng m̄-kam
Will anyone cherish me?

61
00:04:19,500 --> 00:04:22,000
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē chhēng tio̍h
One day I will wear

62
00:04:22,000 --> 00:04:25,500
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê
The one destined by fate

63
00:04:25,500 --> 00:04:28,000
kòa tī hia
Hanging there

64
00:04:28,000 --> 00:04:31,500
hō͘ gún ji̍t-su iā-bāng
Making me dream day and night

65
00:04:31,500 --> 00:04:36,000
hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
That wedding dress
